activities: ISO Claims Services, Inc. (“ISOCS”) licenses a comprehensive claims management system called Claims Outcome Advisor (“COA”).  In connection with its offerings, ISOCS offers support services related to the COA Bureau Service and COA call center help desk.  In the course of providing these services, ISOCS may access or obtain personal data about a corporate customer’s consumers located in the EEA or Switzerland.  ISOCS accesses or obtains these data on behalf of its customers to support the COA Bureau Service or COA call center help desk.  In connection with providing these services, ISOCS acts as a service provider to its customers and pursuant to their instructions.  In addition, ISOCS obtains personal data, such as contact information, in connection with maintaining its customer relationships and providing products and services to its customers.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Enterprise Risk & Compliance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: ISOCS will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
